capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was reading about Harry's family history and it turns out he has a pretty interesting mix of magical heritage. capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was just talking to Harry about Hagrid and he's still the gamekeeper here at Hogwarts, right? He's also in charge of the Care of Magical Creatures class, which is really cool. And did you know that he's also the one who looks after the Forbidden Forest, making sure everything stays safe and secure? I think it's awesome how much responsibility he has on his shoulders, being the key-guardian-and-hunting-ground-guard and all.
